about_the_game:
Watch Corp’s military experiment took a sharp turn. AI developed to harness the powers of reality-bending technology evolved, gaining sentience and turning against humanity. After taking control of all AI controled units, the war to protect it's existence brought humanity on the brink of extinction
With world in ruins, you are our last hope. Join The Beyond, harness the epic powers and become the hero to protect your loved ones and save humanity.

The Watch is a new kind of competitive and fast pacted Action-RTS blending gameplay features of a MOBA. Deep strategical choices with a selection of epic and devastating powers are at your fingertips as you clash with your army against other players for domination of the battlefied.





Grow your army, the battlefield is yours for taking.
Select from various unit types to fill your ranks with different attack styles and damage outputs. Set your strategy, create formations, and utilize military tactics to advance on your opponent.
Create a massive horde to overwhelm and annihilate? Or specialized and nimble, saving your energy for a well-timed special attack?
The decision is yours.

First platoon ready? Start sweeping the battlefield and rank up your units into powerful veterans, increasing their stats for all future replicated units.

To lead an untrained people to war is to throw them away. - Confucious





Unleash the fury of futuristic technologies with space cannons, poisoned artillery shells, and other various means of crushing your enemy, or buff your units with health and protective perks to push through the defensive lines of your opponent.
Featuring stunning visuals and multilayered game mechanics, Flash Blocks are a continually growing set of special abilities in The Watch. There are endless ways to eliminate.
As your arsenal grows, so does the opportunity for strategic play as you balance between offensive or defensive tactics.

Your army is trained and your Flash Blocks are charged. It's time to Dominate.





Conquer the opposition using your heavily armored and mobilized Turrets and break into the opponent’s base to take down The Core.
Support them along the way and capture the platforms scattered throughout the map to gain strategic advantage with the ability to deploy units closer to the front line.
Fight until you overwhelm your enemy in the final battle for The Core, but no matter your choice, the end game is the same: Dominate or die trying.

One does not simply walk into Mordor - Boromir

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: i5-9400F (2.90GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 1660 or AMD® Radeon™ R9 285
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
